name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 13, Jixi, Heilongjiang. It was reported online that local new energy taxis would add a one-yuan fuel surcharge, and drivers would not have any social insurance. The price for drivers to rent a car was as high as 130-220 yuan per day, and the starting price was going to be lowered. Dissatisfied drivers parked their taxis in front of the government building to protest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 12, in Fuzhou, Fujian, a large number of residents surrounded an urban management law enforcement vehicle, slapped the hood and asked the urban management officers in the vehicle to come out. A large number of police officers were present to maintain stability. 
The specific reason is currently unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 13, Foshan, Guangdong. A "coward" from Dadun Village runs a red wine business. He had previously reported the village leaders many times but to no avail. On that day, the urban management confiscated the red wine he was selling on the grounds that the red wine label was blurred. The process of confiscating caused dissatisfaction and protests from the villagers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 7, Qinzhou, Guangxi: Villagers in Shabu Town, Qinnan District, protested against the government for starting construction without compensation after expropriating land, and the villagers clashed with law enforcement officers at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: An incomplete statistics of indiscriminate attacks in China since 2018 compiled by netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, Beijing communities began investigating the situation of “migrant children”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 5, Kaifeng, Henan. The owners of the Huida Zichen project took to the streets and blocked the road to protest against the unfinished project.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 7, in Nanchang, Jiangxi, homeowners of Jianfa Manyun Community protested against the developer’s reduction of specifications and modification of plans.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 8, in Yuncheng, Shanxi, homeowners of Dongfang Huacheng Community protested against the high heating fee. After the protest, the community property management announced that it would respond to the city government's call for the same price in the same city and reduce the heating fee from 20 yuan per square meter to 16 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, at the south gate of Jinxiu Campus of Hefei Normal University, an urban management officer was slashed by a vendor while dispersing them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, Beijing began to collect rental information of migrant population.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, Russian Security Council Secretary and former Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu appeared at the Zhuhai Air Show, and someone at the scene cursed at him in Russian.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, Australia, posters were posted at an entrance of Sydney University, expressing support for the recent Henan night rides and protests against the government ban.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 4, 29-year-old soldier Peng Chenliang from Yunnan, China, died in the defense of Kharkov. He is the only Chinese soldier serving in the Ukrainian International Legion so far. 
We contacted Peng Chenliang's friends, Dong Ge @sudong0606 and "No. 2" from the Ukrainian charity organization "Fighting Cats", to restore Peng Chenliang's last battle and his story in Ukraine.
Peng Chenliang's last battle: Dialogue with Odessa Fighting Cats, the road to freedom for Peng Chenliang, the first Chinese Ukrainian International Legion soldier who died on the Russian-Ukrainian battlefield

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/6SbYY8nis5

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to netizens, the shouting at the scene was the content of Prigozhin's video criticizing Shoigu: Shoigu, where is my ammunition?
And some people said that five or six people shouted at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Local monks monopolize the right to worship Master Hanshan. November 14, Shaoguan, Guangdong. On the 400th anniversary of Master Hanshan's death, devout nuns came to worship Master Hanshan's body, but were blocked by people claiming to be monks from Nanhua Temple with police, and were told that they could only participate in the memorial activities held by the temple. During the process, the police said: This is their territory. The monks who were driven away mentioned that their Buddhist skills were too solid and they could recite scriptures without a homework book, which made the monks of Nanhua Temple embarrassed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User submission
Perfect World APP, the comment area was cancelled because the name of Brazilian player Vini offended Xi Jinping.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, Li Peixia was sentenced to three years in prison and fined 200,000 yuan for "bribery".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, in the Dadun Village incident, villagers reported village cadres online many times. The Lecong Town Government of Foshan issued an open letter: no problems in the performance of duties have been found so far.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 13, Quanzhou, Fujian. A junior high school student at the Luojiang campus of Quanzhou Foreign Language School committed suicide by jumping off a building. The incident occurred during the evening self-study on November 12. The student borrowed a classmate's mobile phone to play and was discovered by the teacher. After the school informed his strict father, his father asked him to kneel down. Unable to endure his father's long-term control, the student chose to commit suicide the next morning. Afterwards, the school tried to block the news and the father tried to shirk responsibility.
